name: Doesn't Matter
description:
How To Play

Press + symbol on the right side of the screen to add a new planet (max 8 planets).

Use the controls in the top right to control the speed of the game.

Adding and upgrading planets costs matter (located in top left corner of the screen).

Select a planet on the left to reveal the upgrade panel for that planet.

You can upgrade speed and size up to 5 times. You can add 1 moon.

Increasing the size of the planet increases matter and score generation.

Increasing speed increases score generation.

Adding a moon adds additional matter and score generation.

The further away the planet from the sun, the higher the score it generates.

Try to get the highest score before the timer runs out!
